/Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Toolchains/XcodeDefault.xctoolchain/usr/bin/c++   -pipe -Os -arch x86_64 -stdlib=libc++  -DNDEBUG -Wl,-search_paths_first -Wl,-headerpad_max_install_names  -L/opt/local/lib -Wl,-headerpad_max_install_names -arch x86_64 -Wl,-dylib_file,/System/Library/Frameworks/OpenGL.framework/Versions/A/Libraries/libGL.dylib:/System/Library/Frameworks/OpenGL.framework/Versions/A/Libraries/libGL.dylib CMakeFiles/executable.dir/Camera.cpp.o CMakeFiles/executable.dir/Image.cpp.o CMakeFiles/executable.dir/Shader.cpp.o CMakeFiles/executable.dir/TriMesh.cpp.o CMakeFiles/executable.dir/Viewer.cpp.o CMakeFiles/executable.dir/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/executable.dir/types.cpp.o  -o executable  -L/opt/local/lib  /opt/local/lib/libmpfr.dylib /opt/local/lib/libgmp.dylib /opt/local/lib/libCGAL.dylib /opt/local/lib/libboost_thread-mt.dylib /opt/local/lib/libboost_system-mt.dylib /opt/local/lib/libCGAL.dylib /opt/local/lib/libboost_thread-mt.dylib /opt/local/lib/libboost_system-mt.dylib -Wl,-rpath,/opt/local/lib
